content: Pikachu is the cutest Pokémon ever!
Charizard will always be my favorite Pokémon.
I can't wait to see what new Pokémon will be introduced in the next game.
This gym battle was so intense, I was on the edge of my seat!
I can't believe how rare that shiny Pokémon was, it took me months to find it!
Mewtwo is such a powerful legendary Pokémon.
I love the strategy involved in competitive Pokémon battles!
The Pokémon anime was such a big part of my childhood!
I just started playing Pokémon Go again, it's so much fun!
The designs for the new generation of Pokémon are so creative!
Eevee is such a versatile Pokémon, I love all its evolutions!
Ash Ketchum is such an iconic character in the Pokémon franchise!
The storyline in this Pokémon game is so engaging, I can't put it down!
